sentences.en: Air at higher levels may remain warmer than that near the ground.
sentences.cn: 高层的空气可能比接近地面的空气较为暖和.

sentences.en: Although we still depict nostalgic snow scenes on Christmas cards, winters are now very much warmer.
sentences.cn: 虽然我们仍在圣诞卡上描绘着具有怀旧气氛的雪景，但现在的冬天比过去暖和多了。

sentences.en: By now he was perspiring and felt warmer and more limber.
sentences.cn: 他身上见了点汗,暖和,也轻松了一些.

sentences.en: He fought off the cold by wearing warmer clothes.
sentences.cn: 他衣服穿得暖和了些,以此治愈感冒.

sentences.en: It is getting warmer day by day.
sentences.cn: 天气一天比一天暖和了.

sentences.en: It's getting warmer day by day.
My bedding was thicker and warmer, too.
sentences.cn: 我的被子也比从前的厚实暖和了.

sentences.en: Owing to the slightly warmer temperature the streets were bad.
sentences.cn: 由于气温稍有回升,街上泥泞难行.

sentences.en: Swimming in the sea is out until the weather gets warmer.
sentences.cn: 在海里游泳还不是时候,等天暖些再游.

sentences.en: The birds are on the wing for warmer countries.
sentences.cn: 鸟儿展翅飞往较温暖的地方.

sentences.en: The days have been getting warmer of late.
The north pole is warmer than the south and the circulation of air around it is less well contained.
sentences.cn: 北极比南极温度高，周围的空气流动也更为顺畅。

sentences.en: The south of England is warmer than the north.
sentences.cn: 英格兰的南方比北方暖和.

sentences.en: The weather is gradually getting warmer.
To those people, these lights must be brighter and warmer still.
sentences.cn: 那么,我想,在这个人的眼里、心上, 前面那些灯光会显得是更明亮、更温暖罢.

words.tran_cn: 使…兴奋；使…温暖；使…感兴趣
取暖器；加热器；加热工人
